languages.text:
Открыв окно осмотра противника, вы можете узнать все подробности о его {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристиках{/g}, а также особых навыках и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностях{/g}, как активных, так и пассивных.
Используйте эту информацию, чтобы подготовиться к бою и принимать тактически-выверенные решения.

You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.
languages.original_text:
Открыв окно осмотра противника, вы можете узнать все подробности о его {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристиках{/g}, а также особых навыках и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностях{/g}, как активных, так и пассивных.
Используйте эту информацию, чтобы подготовиться к бою и принимать тактически-выверенные решения.

traits.locale_text:
You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's characteristics, active abilities, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's characteristics, active abilities, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's characteristics, active abilities, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

languages.text:
Du kannst das Inspektionsfenster aufrufen, um mehr über die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, aktiven {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und passiven Merkmale eines Gegners herauszufinden.
Diese Informationen können dir helfen, dich auf den Kampf vorzubereiten und optimale taktische Entscheidungen zu treffen.
languages.original_text:
You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

traits.locale_text:
Du kannst das Inspektionsfenster aufrufen, um mehr über die Eigenschaften, aktiven Fähigkeiten und passiven Merkmale eines Gegners herauszufinden.
Diese Informationen können dir helfen, dich auf den Kampf vorzubereiten und optimale taktische Entscheidungen zu treffen.

languages.text:
Vous pouvez ouvrir la fenêtre Examiner pour en savoir plus sur les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} actives et passives d'un ennemi.
Ces informations vous aideront à vous préparer au combat et à prendre les meilleures décisions tactiques possible.
languages.original_text:
You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

traits.locale_text:
Vous pouvez ouvrir la fenêtre Examiner pour en savoir plus sur les caractéristiques et les capacités actives et passives d'un ennemi.
Ces informations vous aideront à vous préparer au combat et à prendre les meilleures décisions tactiques possibles.

languages.text:
您可以打开检查窗口，进一步了解敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}、主动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、被动效果。
这些信息可以帮助您做好战斗准备，做出最有效的战术决策。
languages.original_text:
You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

traits.locale_text:
您可以打开检查窗口，进一步了解敌人的属性、主动能力、被动效果。
这些信息可以帮助您做好战斗准备，做出最有效的战术决策。

languages.text:
Puedes abrir la ventana de inspección para saber más sobre las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} activas y rasgos pasivos de un enemigo.
Esta información te ayudará a prepararte para el combate y tomar decisiones tácticas óptimas.
languages.original_text:
You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

traits.locale_text:
Puedes abrir la ventana de inspección para saber más sobre las características, capacidades activas y rasgos pasivos de un enemigo.
Esta información te ayudará a prepararte para el combate y tomar decisiones tácticas óptimas.

languages.original_text:
By opening the enemy's inspection window, you can learn all the details about his characteristics, as well as special skills and abilities, both active and passive.
Use this information to prepare for combat and make tactically sound decisions.

languages.text:
敵のインスペクト・ウィンドウを開けば、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}やアクティブ・{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、パッシブ特性について詳しく知ることができる。
この情報は、戦いに備え、最適な戦術的決断を下すのに役立つ。
languages.original_text:
You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.

traits.locale_text:
敵の調査ウィンドウを開けば、敵の特徴やアクティブアビリティ、パッシブ特性について詳しく知ることができる。
この情報は、戦いに備え、最適な戦術的決断を下すのに役立つ。

languages.text:
Bir düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri,{/g} aktif {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetleri{/g} ve pasif özellikleri hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek için inceleme penceresini açabilirsin.
Bu bilgiler, çatışmaya hazırlanmana ve en uygun taktiksel kararları vermene yardımcı olabilir.
languages.original_text:
You can open the inspect window to find out more about an enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, active {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, and passive traits.
This information can help you prepare for battle and make optimal tactical decisions.
